Today in North Yorks, surf is on at 3 ft @ 8s N with a fresh 14 mph W wind. Withernsea and Filey are your best bets, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with a strong 40 mph WNW wind, making it blown out and poor across the region. Day after, surf picks up to 4 ft @ 8s NE with light 9 mph SSE winds, bringing back some fun options at spots like Withernsea and Filey. Best: day after.
